gui.controller

Class ServerScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.ServerScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ServerScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The ServerGuiController class is the controller which connect the Server Gui Screen with the GoNatureServer instance (and the user who click on the buttons)

        public void printToLogConsole(java.lang.String msg)
        This method write to log.
        Parameters:
        msg - - The String message we want to write to log screen.

      • onConnectServerClicked

        public void onConnectServerClicked()
        This method called when the connect server button was clicked in the gui screen. This method get the data from the text fields in gui screen. and create DBConnectionDetails instance and empty table view.

      • onDisconnectServerClicked

        public void onDisconnectServerClicked()
        This method called when the disconnect server was clicked in the gui screen. This method called to stop the server, clear the table view, and update the gui.

      • onImportDataClicked

        public void onImportDataClicked()
        This method is called when the import data button is clicked in the GUI screen.

      • addToConnected

        public void addToConnected(ConnectionToClient client,
                           java.lang.String username)
        This method add specific client to the connected clients table view in the gui screen.
        Parameters:
        client- - The ConnectionToClient instance which include the details of the client.

      • removeFromConnected

        public void removeFromConnected(ConnectionToClient client)
        This method remove specific client from the connected clients table view in the gui screen. This method called from server when client has been disconnected.
        Parameters:
        client - - The ConnectionToClient instance which include the details of the client.

      • connectionSuccessfull

        public void connectionSuccessfull()
        This method enable the disconnect server button and update all other gui elements.

      • initializeViewTable

        private void initializeViewTable()
        This method initialize the table view, and bind it to the connectedClientsList.

      • disableFields

        private void disableFields(boolean flag)
        This method disable/enable all fields, except disconnected.
        Parameters:
        flag - - boolean flag, to set the gui elements disabled or enabled.
